column1: 16148,Heroes for Hire (2006) #13,13,40073,51,"The Heroes for Hire find themselves in the middle of World War Hulk when their mission to Hulk's stoneship leaves them on the Warbound's death list!  It's divide-and-conquer as each hero is hunted by a member of the Jade Giant's band of alien soldiers.  32 PGS./Rated T  ...$2.99",
